医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
AI 在预测 2 型糖尿病方面显示出前景，但在临床应用方面面临障碍研究人员对基于人工智能的 2 型糖尿病预测模型进行了全面审查，揭示了它们在个体化风险评估和预防性护理方面的潜力。尽管结果令人鼓舞，但该研究仍需要人工智能和医学专家之间进行更广泛的验证和合作，以实现有效的临床应用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/AI-shows-promise-in-predicting-type-2-diabetes-but-faces-hurdles-for-clinical-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/AI-shows-promise-in-predicting-type-2-diabetes-but-faces-hurdles-for-clinical-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f68c09ac-93d4-43da-9ec9-3ae0bddbac4b Thu, 26 Oct 2023 20:43:00 -0400 AI shows promise in predicting type 2 diabetes but faces hurdles for clinical use
您的无糖汽水习惯会影响您的宝宝吗？新研究探索母乳中的低热量甜味剂美国科学家正在研究三氯蔗糖和安赛蜜等低热量甜味剂是否可以通过母乳喂养从母亲转移给婴儿。这种首创的药代动力学模型旨在了解生命早期接触这些甜味剂对健康的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Can-your-diet-soda-habit-affect-your-baby-New-study-explores-low-calorie-sweeteners-in-breastmilk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Can-your-diet-soda-habit-affect-your-baby-New-study-explores-low-calorie-sweeteners-in-breastmilk.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf2a7f18-93ec-4f8e-97cc-c92f1a622dcb Thu, 26 Oct 2023 19:59:00 -0400 Can your diet soda habit affect your baby? New study explores low-calorie sweeteners in breastmilk
地球健康饮食可以拯救你的生命和地球吗？研究发现结果好坏参半一项新的研究发现，坚持强调植物性食品的行星健康饮食（PHD）可以降低新加坡华人患慢性病和死亡的风险。然而，虽然更高的 PHD 分数与温室气体排放量减少 7% 相关，但它们也导致土地和水的使用量增加https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Can-the-planetary-health-diet-save-your-life-and-the-planet-Study-finds-mixed-results.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Can-the-planetary-health-diet-save-your-life-and-the-planet-Study-finds-mixed-results.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6cf6421c-62b9-4070-9659-1fc1722542ec Thu, 26 Oct 2023 19:16:00 -0400 Can the planetary health diet save your life and the planet? Study finds mixed results
昆士兰大学研究表明，子宫内膜异位症和肠易激综合症具有共同的遗传风险因素昆士兰大学的研究人员表明，子宫内膜异位症和肠易激综合征 (IBS) 具有共同的遗传风险因素，这解释了为什么患有一种病症的患者也可能患有另一种病症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Endometriosis-and-irritable-bowel-syndrome-share-genic-risk-factors-UQ-research-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Endometriosis-and-irritable-bowel-syndrome-share-genic-risk-factors-UQ-research-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5266ed00-1fe8-47c7-a2ae-ff6271403c08 Thu, 26 Oct 2023 15:44:00 -0400 Endometriosis and irritable bowel syndrome share genetic risk factors, UQ research shows
开发用于综合治疗类风湿关节炎的新型纳米颗粒系统由首尔国立大学 KOO Sagang 和基础科学中心 (IBS) 纳米粒子研究中心领导的科学家团队与韩国科学技术研究院 (KIST) 和首尔国立大学的研究人员合作，开发了治疗类风湿性关节炎（RA）的新解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/New-nanoarticle-based-system-development-for-compressive-treatment-of-rheumatoid-arthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/New-nanoarticle-based-system-development-for-compressive-treatment-of-rheumatoid-arthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec417e6a-6421-4e15-9b1f-134b054da70e Thu, 26 Oct 2023 15:38:41 -0400 New nanoparticle-based system developed for comprehensive treatment of rheumatoid arthritis
皮肤的体细胞突变与牛皮癣的发生或扩散无关银屑病 -;慢性皮肤病-；新研究表明，这种疾病并非由皮肤自发基因突变引起或传播。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Somatic-mutations-in-the-skin-not-responsible-for-the-start-or-spread-of-psoriasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Somatic-mutations-in-the-skin-not-responsible-for-the-start-or-spread-of-psoriasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f47a11b-96ed-4cdb-9f45-4f89134102b3 Thu, 26 Oct 2023 15:23:33 -0400 Somatic mutations in the skin not responsible for the start or spread of psoriasis
启动临床试验，探索治疗患有创伤后应激障碍 (PTSD) 的军人和退伍军人的新药10 月 16 日启动的一项突破性临床试验将探索新药治疗对患有创伤后应激障碍 (PTSD) 的军事人员和退伍军人的前景。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Clinical-trial-launched-to-explore-new-drug-treatments-for-military-personnel-and-veterans-with-PTSD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Clinical-trial-launched-to-explore-new-drug-treatments-for-military-personnel-and-veterans-with-PTSD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f5f1667-1001-4102-b677-b2e8b4d01a4c Thu, 26 Oct 2023 15:18:26 -0400 Clinical trial launched to explore new drug treatments for military personnel and veterans with PTSD
研究人员开发机器模型来预测年轻人的心脏代谢风险纽约州立大学宾厄姆顿大学的一名研究人员将领导美国国立卫生研究院资助的 250 万美元项目，开发机器模型来识别和预测青少年和年轻人的心脏代谢风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Researchers-to-develop-machine-models-to-predict-cardiometabolic-risks-in-young-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Researchers-to-develop-machine-models-to-predict-cardiometabolic-risks-in-young-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99b637a6-3ccb-4608-96c2-4388666a3b85 Thu, 26 Oct 2023 15:14:50 -0400 Researchers to develop machine models to predict cardiometabolic risks in young people
新发现的氨基酸可能在预测长期新冠肺炎的结果和治疗中发挥关键作用阿尔伯塔大学的研究人员发现了一种氨基酸，它可能在预测不良临床结果和长期新冠肺炎治疗中发挥关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Newly-identified-amino-acid-may-play-key-role-in-predicting-outcomes-and-treatment-of-long-COVID.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Newly-identified-amino-acid-may-play-key-role-in-predicting-outcomes-and-treatment-of-long-COVID.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=16099ef9-334d-4292-8458-1b4887759982 Thu, 26 Oct 2023 14:56:00 -0400 Newly identified amino acid may play key role in predicting outcomes and treatment of long COVID
授予 340 万美元赠款，用于确定急性呼吸窘迫综合征的治疗方法美国国立卫生研究院下属的国家心肺血液研究所向 UTHealth 休斯顿研究人员提供了一项为期四年、价值 340 万美元的拨款，用于研究急性呼吸窘迫综合征 (ARDS) 的分子机制和治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/2434-million-grant-awarded-to-identify-therapeutic-treatments-for-acute-respiratory-distress-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/2434-million-grant-awarded-to-identify-therapeutic-treatments-for-acute-respiratory-distress-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5fa7ee3e-bd69-4e67-bd56-fc31a3fe56c6 Thu, 26 Oct 2023 14:51:55 -0400 $3.4 million grant awarded to identify therapeutic treatments for acute respiratory distress syndrome
